sentences.english: In Chinese Mythology, Laojun was in charge of alchemy.
sentences.chinese: 在中国神话里，太上老君专职修炼仙丹。

sentences.english: Houyi some magic pills that could make him live forever.
sentences.chinese: 他给了后羿一些能使他长生不老的仙丹。

sentences.english: In her panic, Chang`e drank it all up.
sentences.chinese: 嫦娥慌乱中服下了所有的仙丹。

sentences.english: You give me pearls of wisdom every day.
It is the best remedy in a world of stress.
sentences.chinese: 是在这充满压力的世界中最妙的仙丹。

definition: legendary magic potion of immortals/panacea/fig. wonder solution to a problem
prescription of elixir/potion of immortality/potion prescribed by an immortal
effective cure, miracle medicine (idiom); fig. wonder-cure for all problems/panacea/elixir
flat peach (aka Saturn peach or donut peach)/the peaches of immortality kept by Xi Wangmu 西王母
legendary magic potion of immortals/panacea/fig. wonder solution to a problem
variant of 鏈|链[lian4], chain/variant of 煉|炼[lian4]
maker of immortality pill/concocting magic pills
